channel.title: Issues with not being able to run client
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to run the CaliScape Client V.4.0, I click "Start Server" and it says 'Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. I tried taking a run.batch from a client that does work but for some reason it will still not run it.
I put this
@echo off cd files Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
But it does not work, it says 'Gui' is not found.
Help is needed, please help thank you.

item.title: Issues with not being able to run client
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Hello, I am trying to run the CaliScape Client V.4.0, I click “Start Server” and it says ‘Java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. I tried taking a run.batch from a client that does work but for some reason it will still not run it.

I put this

@echo off
cd files
Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

But it does not work, it says ‘Gui’ is not found.

Help is needed, please help thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: Issues with not being able to run client
